dictionary.definition: a round fruit with red, green, or yellow skin and a crisp texture.
a long curved fruit with a soft yellow skin and creamy flesh.
a citrus fruit with a tough orange skin and juicy, segmented flesh.
small round or oval berries growing in clusters on a vine, typically green, purple, or red.
a sweet, red fruit with tiny seeds on its surface and a green leafy cap.
a large, green-skinned fruit with juicy red flesh and black seeds.
a tropical fruit with a tough, spiky skin, and sweet, juicy yellow flesh.
a small, brown, fuzzy fruit with green flesh and black seeds.
a tropical fruit with a smooth, sweet, orange flesh and a tough skin.
a soft, round fruit with fuzzy skin and a sweet, juicy flesh.
a sweet, juicy fruit with a thin skin and a shape like a teardrop.
a small, round fruit with a bright red or dark purple skin and a single hard seed.
a small, round berry with dark blue skin and sweet flesh.
a small, red or black berry that grows on bushes and has a sweet-tart flavor.
a small, round fruit with smooth skin and sweet or tart flesh.
